Title: Prove that $x$ and $x+1$ are coprime numbers
Content: Given $\{x \mid x > 1\}$, how do I prove that any given $x$ and $x+1$ are coprime?
AcceptedAnswer: If $y$ divides $x$ and $x+1$ then it divides $(x+1)-x=1$. Conclude.
